SEARCH
Package raytracer

Class Scene

java.lang.Object
raytracer.Scene
public final class Scene extends Object
Scene container holding camera, output settings, ambient light, lights, and shapes. Provides closest-hit intersection search and shading routines.

    • findClosestIntersection

      public Optional<Intersection> findClosestIntersection(Ray ray)
      Finds the closest intersection of the given ray with any shape.
      Parameters:
      ray - ray to test
      Returns:
      optional closest hit, or empty if none

    • shade

      public Color shade(Intersection isect, Ray viewRay)
      Computes shaded color at an intersection using ambient + Lambert + Blinn-Phong, skipping contributions from lights that are shadowed.
      Parameters:
      isect - intersection data
      viewRay - ray from camera to the hit
      Returns:
      shaded color
